OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualRoleDef_Psychi.label: invoker
OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualRoleDef_Psychi.description: The invoker must be psychically sensitive to channel the energies of the ritual.

OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualDef_Enduvia.label: Enduvia
OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualDef_Enduvia.description: A dangerous ritual to call forth a necromancer's "soul", conciousness patterns scattered across dimensions, linked together by some invisible force, a link.
OneWithDeath.PsychicRitualDef_Enduvia.outcomeDescription: The selected soul will be transferred to the sacrifice, overwriting their mind. If a soul already present in the world is chosen, or if no soul is chosen at all, the ritual will fail catastrophically.
